name: MedicalCostBurdenDiagnoses
title: Medical Cost Burden Diagnoses
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata> 
The value sets in this group represent the diagnoses associated with medical cost burden as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation guide for the exchange of condition.code.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD-10-CM and SNOMED CT diagnoses that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

contains.display: Financial insecurity due to cost burden of medical expenses (finding)
Encounter for counseling for socioeconomic factors
Patient's noncompliance with dietary regimen due to financial hardship
Caregiver's intentional underdosing of patient's medication regimen due to financial hardship
